title: POtHS - Victory Over Sin vol 27 - The Promise of Grace
description:
POtHS
Pouring Out the Holy Spiritruth

POtHS - Victory Over Sin vol 27 - The Promise of Grace



Description

Logicship Or Lordship Salvation, Mission ARY or Mission FIELD?
Are you a soul saver or a soul needing saving?
We are to abide in the TRUE VINE and bear much fruit or we will be cut off and cast into the fire.
No one can say JESUS IS LORD without the aid of the Holy Ghost, and if they do in their flesh they at this point don't truly or fully comprehend what that really entails.
believe on the LORD JESUS Christ and thou shalt be saved!
and yes the emphasis is the word "LORD"
"Jesus is Lord" is only possible when a soul comes to grips with the fact that Jesus is worthy to be Lord in all their life from now till eternity. I believe this is the testimony of scripture of genuine salvation and saving faith. AMEN
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Alleged Bible Contradictions Concerning Salvation--Audio:
by Jeff Miller, Ph.D.
Confusion and disagreement exist within Christendom concerning salvation. For exmple, some believe baptism is not necessary for one to receive salvation, while others argue that baptism is essential. Both cannot be right. In the midst of the confusion, the skeptic gains support for his proposition that the Bible must contain contradictions, since both "sides" believe their view is supported by the Bible. Does the Bible contain contradictions regarding salvation? Are there requirements for our salvation?
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Is Once Saved Always Saved True?
Are you saved or deceived? This compelling series of video clips will help you examine yourself and your salvation from a true biblical perspective. A MUST SEE FOR ALL CHRISTIANS...
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

The Holy Spirit and Apologetics by Al Mohler:
This video was produced from Ligonier Ministries 2007 National Conference.

Visit Ligonier Ministries at http://www.ligonier.org/ It is a cyber portal to a wonderful world for all ages with many resources to assist you in defending your faith in Jesus Christ.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Signs - Part 59:
A folder compiled of various short clips presenting recent apocalyptic signs occurring around the world today to help us identify the state of affairs ushering the end of days.  View what's been happening in our time and descern for yourself the onset of Revelations and what may lay ahead.  
----------------------------------------------------------------------

More featured videos also included without description...
Cry of the Father
The Homeless Problem
How is your Heart by Josh Olson
October 13 2013 - Carter Conlon - Promise Of A Captive Nation
Receiving and Giving God's Love
Reza Afshar - Love Thy Neighbour
The Faithfulness of God

Also included are our End-Times and Xtras folders

This is in memory of my Mom who passed at 11:44 pm PST ON 1-25-2011. Now she knows.

These Torrents are currently on a Free Leech --  High Speed Server

JESUS: Believe this about Jesus to move on to Greener Pastures.

Born of a Virgin, He was killed for our transgressions, His blood was shed as a sacrifice to atone for my sins. He was buried and ROSE three days later, according to The Scriptures. Praise the Lord for HE HAS RISEN. I am now forgiven for my sins, past, present and future and can live on with the Lord in Eternity, forever.

RAPtURE (My transportation outta here).

The Blessed Hope.  If you believe in The Rapture you better believe The Above Statement and that the Sacrificed Blood of Jesus, on the Cross paid for your sins and there is NOTHING Else you can do to gain Salvation, The GRACE of Christ did it ALL. Now you just have to believe that with all your Heart, Mind and Soul or Maybe Get Left Behind. All PAST, Present and Future Sins are Forgiven with Jesus. (I wouldn't PUSH That Future sin statement to much!!!)

In a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trump: for the trumpet shall sound, and the dead shall be raised incorruptible, and we shall be changed...

"And He will send forth His angels with A GREAT TRUMPET and THEY WILL GATHER TOGETHER His elect from the four winds, from one end of the sky to the other.

"Do not marvel at this; for an hour is coming, in which all who are in the tombs will hear His voice,  Then we who are alive and remain will be caught up together with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in The Air, and there we will be forever be with him...hmmm sounds like some of us might be Immortal. (Ask your preacher about that)
